TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the Undead Dragon. You can try to fight it again or simply return to Elistara.
You have defeated the Undead Dragon. You must return to Elistara with the news.
There is no sign of Elistara's Dragon here.
Elistara is devastated by the news.
You must search for Elistara's Dragon in the Realms of Death.
You may continue to try and fight the Dragon, or return to Elistara.
You must return to Elistara in Ylarie.
You do not find the Dragon, but there appear to be some Dragon tracks leading towards Lord Bane's Citadel.
